scripts.changelog:mac: cp package.json _package.json && preset=`conventional-commits-detector` && echo $preset && bump=`conventional-recommended-bump -p angular` && echo ${1:-$bump} && npm --no-git-tag-version version ${1:-$bump} &>/dev/null && conventional-changelog -i CHANGELOG.md -s -p ${2:-$preset} -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && version=`npm run env | grep npm_package_version | awk '{print substr($0,21)}' | awk 'NR==1{print}'` && git commit -m "docs(CHANGELOG): update for $version" && rm -f _package.json && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore(release): $version"
